H0.text: The key is the feature Sal should look for on the map of Massachusetts to determine how many actual miles the inches measured from Boston to Salem represent.

H1.text: Scale is the feature of the Massachusetts map that Sal should look at to convert the inches he measured from Boston to Salem into the actual miles those inches represent.

H2.text: Legend is the feature of the Massachusetts map that Sal should examine to determine how many actual miles the measured inches from Boston to Salem represent.

H3.text: Compass is the map feature Sal should look for to determine how many actual miles the inches from Boston to Salem represent.

A4.text: The scale of a map is the ratio of a distance on the map to the corresponding distance on the ground.
